question:
[Gene] and his brother [Joanne] were grilling hamburgers outside. [Helen], [Gene]'s mother, came out to bring them cold sweet tea. [Helen] just had a baby and presented the baby proudly to the new maternal grandmother, [Dorothy]. [Dorothy] asked her daughter, [Kecia], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night. [Johnny] was playing tennis with his sister [Kecia]. Afterwards, he was planning on playing chess with his sister [Sharon].
Question: How is [Sharon] related to [Joanne]?
